Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior is ribbed and partially covered with a light-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and the beginning of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394964) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394964)
